entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a character who throws out his right arm to signal that they should stop. He is described as saying 'Really easy' and 'Very quiet, now . . .' in a soft tone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who sees the large mound of earth and thinks it might be the lair of some enormous animal. He is described as being able to hear a distant, rhythmic rumbling that sounds like a pair of enormous lungs at work.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who is gazing at the mound with her mouth slightly open and looking utterly terrified. She whispers to Hagrid in a barely audible tone.
